page.title: 05 LONG TIME VILLAGERS
page.content: We went to see Mrs Reece and Mr Michael who have lived in Ewyas Harold {village all their life}and have seen a lot of changes in that time. After the war evacuated children came back to their home, more babies were born and more families from outside came here to live.Mains water, electricity and drains were provided and many more houses were built. In the fifties {bungalows}were very popular and the number of{council}owned{houses increased from{4 to 74.}The main difference to the school of today is that most children remained at the old {school}till the age of{14.}There hasn't been much change in the{shops but there are{fewer}now than in the war because most households have a{car and can{shop}in{Hereford}or {Abergavenny.
